::Soundwave's mind is wandering.  He relives his entire life in an instant.  
He remembers that he had betrayed someone in his life.  Megatron.  He 
remembers that Astrotrain needed to "jettison some weight".  He chose between 
loyalty to his commander and his own selfish needs, he chose himself.  Was 
that why Galvatron forced him into stasis?  Then he sees a bot, a child, not 
much more than 5 steller cycles old.  Who was this stange bot?  He opens his 
eyes, to see the same child standing over him, with a shield over them::
Soundwave: Am I dead?
